title: Letterhead redesign, lost our PSD File.
content:
Thanks for taking the time to look at this. I have lost the PSD file and needed to change the letterhead. Would like to keep the same font.  
Here is some of the letterhead. Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013020023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ltrhead1_5856.jpg)
author: tia4a

comments.content:
[Akzidenz-Grotesk BQ Medium Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013020023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/medium-extended/) is very close. But some more digging might yield a 100% match. [Link to some possibilities](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013020023/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?HG8).  
Don
I think this is [Adobe Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013020023/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=adobe+sans&q=Go), a substitution font.
